hero.headline: Welcome to Secret Beauty Kempston
hero.subheadline: One-on-one treatments in a judgement-free sanctuary—refresh, relax, and reveal your radiance.

about.title: About Secret Beauty
about.description: At Secret Beauty Kempston we believe every client deserves personalised care in a calm, confidential environment. Our expert therapists specialise in skin, body and nail treatments that rejuvenate and restore. Whether you’re looking for a quick pick-me-up or a full pamper session, our bespoke packages ensure you leave feeling confident and refreshed.

items.title: Signature Facial
items.description: Tailored skincare using premium brands to cleanse, exfoliate and nourish your complexion for a radiant glow.

items.title: Therapeutic Massage
items.description: Choose from Swedish, deep tissue or hot stone massage to relieve tension, improve circulation and promote relaxation.

items.title: Waxing & Threading
items.description: Precision hair removal for brows, lip, chin, legs and more—smooth results with gentle, professional care.

items.title: Manicure & Pedicure
items.description: Luxury nail care with shaping, cuticle treatment and polish application for beautifully finished hands and feet.

items.title: Makeup Artistry
items.description: Natural day looks or glam evening makeup using high-end cosmetics tailored to your style and skin tone.

items.title: Skin Consultation
items.description: In-depth analysis and personalised advice on homecare routines, professional peels, and corrective treatments.

items.title: One-on-One Care
items.description: Dedicated therapist for every appointment—no double-booking, just your full attention.

items.title: Judgement-Free Zone
items.description: A warm, welcoming space where you can relax, confident that your privacy and comfort come first.

items.title: Premium Products
items.description: We use only top-tier skincare and cosmetic brands, selected for safety, efficacy and luxurious feel.

items.title: Flexible Scheduling
items.description: Early, late and weekend appointments available to fit your busy lifestyle.

items.question: Do I need to book in advance?
items.answer: Yes, we recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance to secure your preferred time and therapist.

items.question: What should I bring to my first appointment?
items.answer: Just yourself and any form of ID. We’ll provide everything else, including robes, towels and refreshments.

items.question: Are your products cruelty-free?
items.answer: Absolutely. We only use and stock brands that are cruelty-free and ethically sourced.

items.question: What is your cancellation policy?
items.answer: Please give us at least 12 hours’ notice. Late cancellations may incur a 50% charge of your booked treatment.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Call, message or book online to schedule your personalised beauty session. We’re here to answer any questions.
